index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing development, authorizing an agreement, accepting a housing development grant from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development to assist in the development of the YWCA Women's Residence project; authorizing implementation of the project by the Department of Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund and establishing a repayment account; and, authorizing the Mayor or his designee to enter into necessary implementing agreements.
